data.title: Dad’s Ultimate Struggle to Make His Daughter a Star Singer! – Rajhans Cinemas Blog
data.text:
The trio Bollywood stalwarts Rajkummar Rao, Anil Kapoor and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan will be pairing up in this musical comedy directed by Atul Manjrekar. With such an engrossing star cast, this movie has already grabbed the eyeballs of moviegoers and not to mention the immense buzz oozed out of trailer. To your surprise, Aishwarya Rai will be seen as a famous singer named Baby Singh whereas Anil Kapoor as Fanney Khan and Raj Kummar Rao as Adhir. Apart from its trailer, the audiences have also been swooning over recently released two tracks from the Fanney Khan titled ‘Halka Halka’ and ‘Mohabbat.’

Here are a few interesting facts about this musical comedy!

Anil and Aishwarya will reunite onscreen after 18 years

Actor Anil Kapoor and the beauty queen Aishwarya Rai together shared screen space in the 2000 hit movie ‘Hamara Dil Aapke Paas Hai.’ And now after 18 long years, the duo will once again share the big screen which will enhance the curiosity of the audience.

It is an official remake of Belgian film “Everybody’s Famous”!

Believe it or not, Fanney Khan is a Hindi adaptation of a famous Belgian movie titled Everybody’s Famous! Directed by Dominique Deruddere. This movie was also nominated for an Academy Award at the 73rd Academy Awards.

The beauty queen trained by an international choreographer

Yes!Aishwarya Rai is all gear up to shake a leg to the tunes and for this she has taken lessons from internationally-acclaimed choreographer Frank Gatson Jr., who also trained some of the renowned singers such as Jennifer Lopez, Beyoncé and Rihanna among others.

Aishwarya will essay an inspiring role for youths

The movie Fanney Khan also details a sensitive issue which is very much prevalent in our societies such as body shaming and Aishwarya will be seen enlightening the young generation on this issue with her excellent performance.

Rajkummar Rao to romance Aishwarya

Last year, Ranbir Kapoor and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan had set the screen ablaze with their sizzling chemistry in Karan Johar’s ‘Ae Dil Hai Mushkil’. And now almost a year later, she is once again set to romance a talented, younger actor Rajkummar Rao.

In this movie, Fanney Khan (Anil Kapoor) aspires to be a singer but due to lack of opportunity he goes astray from his dream. Even though hailing from a middle class family, he clings onto his dream and thus, plans to continue his musical dream through his overweight daughter, Lata (Pihu Sand). Unfortunately, between all these struggles, he kidnaps India’s biggest popstar, Baby Singh (Aishwarya Rai Bachchan). So will things go as planned?

Book your ticket at your nearest Rajhans Cinemas and take a musical comedy ride to rejuvenate your routine.
